title: Movies REST API
description: Developed a RESTful API for a movie database using Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB. The API provides endpoints for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting movie data and user authentication.

title: Blogr Landing Page
description: Developed a responsive landing page with captivating animations using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The inclusion of responsive design ensures an optimal user experience across various devices.

title: Easybank Landing page
description: A responsive landing page built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The focus of this project is on delivering an elegant and user-friendly layout that adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes and devices.

title: Sneakers product page
description: An E-commerce product page built with React with responsive layout
